languages.text: {n}Подобно игле на ее кольце, слова Регины сочатся ядом и злостью.{/n} "Потому что Даргонус служит самозван{mf|цу|ке}. Истинный наследник протектората носит иное имя! Когда Кунрад появился на Даргонусе, он имел со мной встречу — встречу, которая открыла мне глаза на истинную ситуацию. Теодора была убита {mf|тем|той}, кого столь неосмотрительно пригрела под своим боком!"

traits.locale_text: [draft] отвечает так, чтобы игроку хотелось ее прибить, но с достоинством
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"
languages.original_text: {n}Подобно игле на ее кольце, слова Регины сочатся ядом и злостью.{/n} "Потому что Даргонус служит самозван{mf|цу|ке}. Истинный наследник протектората носит иное имя! Когда Кунрад появился на Даргонусе, он имел со мной встречу — встречу, которая открыла мне глаза на истинную ситуацию. Теодора была убита {mf|тем|той}, кого столь неосмотрительно пригрела под своим боком!"

The true heir of the protectorate has a different name! When Kunrad has appeared on Dargonus, he visited me — and opened my eyes to the real situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had taken under her wing so carelessly!"

languages.text: {n}レジーナの言葉から、彼女の指輪の針のように、毒と怒りがしたたり落ちる。{/n}「ダルゴナスが詐欺師に仕えているからよ。 保護領の真の後継者は別のお方。クンラッドは、ダルゴナスに現れた際、思いがけず私の元を訪れてくださった。そして私に真実を気づかせてくれたの。シオドーラはかわいがってた人間に殺されたのよ、不注意が過ぎたのね！」
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナの言葉から、彼女の指輪の針のように、毒と怒りがしたたり落ちる。{/n}「ダルゴナスが詐欺師に仕えているからよ。 保護領の真の後継者は別のお方。クンラッドは、ダルゴナスに現れた際、思いがけず私の元を訪れてくださった。そして私に真実を気づかせてくれたの。シオドーラはかわいがってた人間に殺されたのよ、不注意が過ぎたのね！」
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜的话语就像戒指上的毒针一样，极尽恶毒与愤怒。{/n}“因为达戈努斯落入了骗子之手，这个王朝真正的继承者另有其人！昆拉德上次来到达戈努斯时曾经见过我一面，他说出的真相真是令我大开眼界。原来，西奥多拉居然是被她无意中收留的白眼狼咬死的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜的话语就像戒指上的毒针一样，极尽恶毒与愤怒。{/n}“因为达戈努斯落入了骗子之手，这个王朝真正的继承者另有其人！昆拉德上次来到达戈努斯时曾经见过我一面，他说出的真相真是令我大开眼界。原来，西奥多拉居然是被她无意中收留的白眼狼咬死的！”
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Les paroles de Régina sont aussi empoisonnées que l'aiguille de sa bague.{/n} « Parce que Dargonus est au service d'un imposteur. Le véritable héritier du protectorat porte un autre nom ! Quand Kunrad s'est présenté sur Dargonus, il est venu à ma rencontre et m'a ouvert les yeux. Il m'a dit que Théodora avait été tuée par {mf|celui|celle}-là même qu'elle avait commis l'erreur de prendre sous son aile ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les paroles de Régina sont aussi empoisonnées que l'aiguille de sa bague.{/n} « Parce que Dargonus est au service d'un imposteur. Le véritable héritier du protectorat porte un autre nom ! Quand Kunrad s'est présenté sur Dargonus, il est venu à ma rencontre et m'a ouvert les yeux. Il m'a dit que Théodora avait été tuée par {mf|celui|celle}-là même qu'elle avait commis l'erreur de prendre sous son aile ! »
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Al igual que la punta de su anillo, las palabras de Regina emanan veneno y rabia.{/n} «Porque Dargonus está al servicio de un{mf||a} impostor{mf||a}. ¡El verdadero heredero del protectorado es otro! Cuando Kunrad llegó a Dargonus, me hizo una visita durante la que me ayudó a ver la verdad. ¡Theodora fue asesinada por quien estaba bajo su protección!».
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al igual que la punta de su anillo, las palabras de Regina emanan veneno y rabia.{/n} «Porque Dargonus está al servicio de un{mf||a} impostor{mf||a}. ¡El verdadero heredero del protectorado es otro! Cuando Kunrad llegó a Dargonus, me hizo una visita durante la que me ayudó a ver la verdad. ¡Theodora fue asesinada por quien estaba bajo su protección!».
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Wie die Nadel an ihrem Ring triefen auch Reginas Worte vor Gift und Wut.{/n} "Weil Dargonus {mf|einem Hochstapler|einer Hochstaplerin} dient. Der wahre Erbe des Protektorats trägt einen anderen Namen! Als Kunrad nach Dargonus kam, suchte er mich auf ... und öffnete mir die Augen für die Wahrheit. Theodora wurde ausgerechnet von der Person getötet, die sie so arglos unter ihre Fittiche genommen hatte!"
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie der Stachel an ihrem Ring triefen Reginas Worte vor Gift und Wut.{/n} "Dargonus dient {mf|einem Hochstapler|einer Hochstaplerin}. Der wahre Erbe des Protektorats hat einen anderen Namen. Als Kunrad nach Dargonus gekommen ist, hat er mich besucht. Dieses Treffen hat mir die Augen geöffnet. Theodora wurde von dem getötet, den sie unvorsichtigerweise unter ihre Fittiche genommen hatte!"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback

languages.text: {n}Yüzüğündeki iğne gibi Regina'nın sözlerinden de zehir ve öfke damlıyor.{/n} "Çünkü Dargonus, bir sahtekâra hizmet ediyor. Protektoranın asıl vârisinin adı başkadır! Kunrad, Dargonus'a geldiğinde beni ziyaret etti. Hakikati de onun sayesinde gördüm. Theodora'yı öldüren, güvenip de kanatları altına aldığı şahıstır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Like the spike on her ring, Regina's words are dripping with poison and rage.{/n} "Because Dargonus is serving an impostor. The true heir of the protectorate bears a different name! When Kunrad appeared on Dargonus, he paid me a visit — and opened my eyes to the truth of the situation. Theodora was killed by the one whom she had so unwarily taken under her wing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzüğündeki iğne gibi Regina'nın sözlerinden de zehir ve öfke damlıyor.{/n} "Çünkü Dargonus, bir sahtekâra hizmet ediyor. Protektoranın asıl vârisinin adı başkadır! Kunrad, Dargonus'a geldiğinde beni ziyaret etti. Hakikati de onun sayesinde gördüm. Theodora'yı öldüren, güvenip de kanatları altına aldığı şahıstır!"
traits.speaker: ReginaZaurback
